summary: WE HAVE HAD THE BACK DOOR LOCK FREEZE AND CANNOT UNLOCK BACK DOORS. WE ARE REPLACING PASSENGER BACK DOOR LOCK FOR SECOND TIME AND HAVE REPLACED DRIVER SIDE BACK DOOR LOCK ONCE.  THIS IS VERY DANGEROUS AS DOORS CANNOT BE OPENED FROM INSIDE AND IF IN ACCIDENT IT COULD CAUSE A DEATH.  THERE NEEDS TO BE AN INVESTIGATION INTO THIS MATTER.  THREE TIMES REPLACING LOCKS IS TOO MUCH!
